sourcesContent:
import colors from "../../helpers/colors"

const styles = () => ({
    containerFilter: {
        backgroundColor: colors.white2,
        width: 'fit-content',
        paddingInline: 8,
        marginRight: 8,
        marginBlock: 8,
        paddingBlock: 6,
        border: '1px solid #EA5C5570' ,
        borderRadius: 6,
        display: 'flex',
        alignItems: 'center',
        justifyContent: 'space-between'
    },
    filterIconImg: {
        alignSelf: 'right',
        height: 6,
        // position: 'absolute',
        marginLeft: 8,
        cursor: 'pointer',
    },
    fontFilter: {
        alignSelf: 'center',
        fontSize: 12,
        textDecoration: 'none',
        display: 'inline-table',
        color: colors.red
    }
})

export default styles
